description: An object representing a class element. Mandatory fields: constant "type": "Class", "id", "name", "stereotype", "properties", "propertyAssignments", "isAbstract", "isDerived", "isExtensional", "isPowertype", "order", "natures". Additional fields NOT allowed.

restrictedTo.description: A nullable array of unique enumerated strings that represents the allowed (possible) ontological natures of the class's instances.

isExtensional.description: A boolean field that captures if a class decorated as «collective» is extensionally defined (i.e., it's parts cannot change).

isPowertype.description: A boolean field that captures if a class decorated as «type» represents a powertype.

order.description: A string field that captures the type-order of a class decorated as «type». This field supports the representation of second-order types or greater, thus its minimum value is "2". This field must be set to "*" for orderless types.
